page.title: 08A VISIT TO HILL FARM.
page.content: {Hill Farm}is a farm near Upend. Lord Fairhaven owns it and Mrs Bowyer is the Tenant. She told us about the farm and showed us round. The farm is about 350 acres big. They grow barley which is like wheat but has long purplish brown whiskers and is mostly used for animal feed. They grow wheat which is thick and green.It is used for flour to make bread and biscuits. And they also grow beans which are shipped out to Germany. They spray the fields with aerial sprays, to keep weeds and insects down. The main machines they have on the farm are Case tractors and combine harvesters. The combines separates the straw from the grain and sends the straw out of the big hole in the bottom. ***************
